subject: Pro X Ultra Pedals with VAM Not Upgrading Firmware
description_text:
Simsonn Support,

I have a set of Pro X Ultra pedals with VAM upgrade and am having the brake
pedal VAM unit stay vibrating at max oscillation after I have shut down
Assetto Corsa and SimHub. The Simsonn software is showing that there is a
firmware update that I hope will fix this issue, but I can't get it to
install. Can I get the latest Pro X Ultra firmware from you guys to see if
this fixes this issue? Really hoping that this fixes the issue because the
only way that I can get the brake pedal to stop vibrating is to power off
the control box and then pull the USB connection from the computer to force
all power off of the pedals. Any help would be appreciated, and thanks so
much!

conversations.body_text: Hi J W,  请您先卸载电脑上的 2.1.0 版本，然后通过这个链接安装 2.1.1 版本。接着在软件的设置中手动更新固件。  如果过程中遇到问题，请将截图或视频发给我，我会协助您检查环境并解决问题。     https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mS9dS2GyzhRYo81BcmTIOXY1POa6RvST/view?usp=drive_lin
